name: Multi Gather DbVisualizer Connections Settings
author: David Bloom
description:
DbVisualizer stores the user database configuration in dbvis.xml.
          This module retrieves the connections settings from this file and decrypts the encrypted passwords.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: PASSPHRASE
options.description: The hardcoded passphrase used for encryption

options.name: ITERATION_COUNT
options.description: The iteration count used in key derivation
